```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(comorbidity)
library(dplyr)

diagnosis <- read.csv('/Users/fan/Desktop/Fullhouse/WCM/HospitalManagement/Data/diagnosis.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)[-1]
summary(diagnosis)
```

```{r}
charlson10 <- comorbidity(x = diagnosis, id = "ID", code = "Diagnosis", score = "charlson", icd = "icd10", assign0 = FALSE)
charlson10

charlson <- charlson10 %>%
  select(ID, score)

colnames(charlson) <- c("ID", "Charlson")
charlson
```

```{r}
elixhauser10 <- comorbidity(x = diagnosis, id = "ID", code = "Diagnosis", score = "elixhauser", icd = "icd10", assign0 = FALSE)
elixhauser10

elixhauser <- elixhauser10 %>%
  select(ID, score) 

colnames(elixhauser) <- c("ID", "Elixhauser")
elixhauser
```

```{r}
comorbidityscore <- merge(elixhauser, charlson, by = "ID")

as.character(comorbidityscore$ID)
comorbidityscore

write.csv(comorbidityscore, '/Users/fan/Desktop/Fullhouse/WCM/HospitalManagement/Data/ComorbidityScore.csv')
```
